<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">[Font of Serenity](/Spells.aspx?ID=613)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 116 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Repose](/Domains.aspx?ID=49)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Area** 15-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

A divine beacon radiates serenity, soothing nearby allies. Allies within the area gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) effects. An ally can touch the font as an Interact action; if they do so, the spell attempts to counteract one emotion effect affecting the ally of the ally’s choice, after which that emotion effect is temporarily immune for 1 day. If the spell succeeds at the counteract check, it removes the emotion effect from your ally, though not from any other creatures the effect might be affecting.

---
**Heightened (+4)** The bonus increases by 1.
name: Font of Serenity
